featured.text: The Amazons are completely dependent on their slaves ____(29)___ their sharp jaws, so well suited for fighting, are useless in taking care of larvae or for digging.
The problem is made worse by doctors who give their patients large doses of useless drugs.

definition.zh_def: 無用的；沒有價值或效果的。
definition.en_def: Not serving any purpose; of no use or value.
definition.example: The broken tool was completely useless for the job.
